featured.text: The prickly pear has a number of advantages over other biofuel crops, such as wheat, sugarcane, and soybeans.
A country is said to have a comparative advantage over another when it can produce a commodity more cheaply.
What is the advantage of calling your pet’s name when taking a shot of it? (A)
My father’s poor memory gave him certain advantages, though.

other.text: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of the digital camera over the film camera? (A)
In this passage, the following advantages of casual office wear are mentioned EXCEPT _________.
What advantage does the prickly pear cactus have over other biofuel crops?
One major advantage of the soybean as a food source is that __________.

definition.en_def: A condition or circumstance that puts one in a favorable or superior position.
definition.example: Having a good education can give you an advantage in the job market.
